title: Property Manifest Schema
description: A property in your entity. Doc: https://docs.case.app/properties

name.description: The name of the property. Doc: https://docs.case.app/properties

type.description: The type of the property: text, number, link, currency... Default "string". Doc: https://docs.case.app/property-types

hidden.description: If the property should be hidden in the API response. Default false. Doc: https://docs.case.app/property-types?id=hidden

validation.description: The validation for the property with Class Validator. Doc: https://docs.case.app/property-types?id=validation

anyOf.description: A simple string representing the type of the property.
